mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dc_sys_operate
id, menuId, url, operateName, operateCode, orderNo, createDate, createdBy, updateDate, updatedBy,
VALUES
#{id}, #{menuId}, #{url}, #{operateName}, #{operateCode}, #{orderNo}, #{createDate}, #{createdBy}, #{updateDate}, #{updatedBy},
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, m.id AS menuId, m.menuName, m.content, o.operateCode, o.operateName, o.url, o.orderNo, m2.menuName as parentMenuName, m2.menuId as parentMenuId, m2.content as parentContent FROM dc_sys_operate o inner JOIN dc_sys_menu m ON o.menuId = m.id left join dc_sys_menu m2 on m.parentMenuId=m2.menuId where m.status=0 ORDER BY m2.menuId, m2.menuLevel, m.menuLevel, o.orderNo

SELECT count(1) FROM dc_sys_operate o LEFT JOIN dc_sys_menu m ON o.menuId = m.id left join dc_user u on o.updatedBy=u.id where 1=1
and o.menuId=#{menuId}
and o.operateName like '%${operateName}%'
ORDER BY o.menuId, o.orderNo
select id,menuId,url,operateName,operateCode,orderNo from dc_sys_operate o where o.operateCode=#{operateCode}

SELECT o.id, m.id AS menuId, m.menuName, o.operateCode, o.operateName, o.url, o.orderNo FROM dc_sys_operate o inner JOIN ( select * from dc_sys_menu s where s.id in (select cm.menuId from dc_customer_menu cm where cm.departmentId=#{pcCompanyId}) ) m ON o.menuId = m.id where m.status=0 ORDER BY o.menuId, o.orderNo
